languages.text: Идира просит Вольного Торговца исследовать Простор Коронус, чтобы найти неизвестный мир из ее видений. Когда Идира почувствует, что цель близко, она сообщит об этом.

traits.locale_text: Исследуйте Простор Коронус в поисках неизвестного мира. Идира почувствует, когда вы приблизитесь к цели.

languages.text: Idira has earnestly requested that the Rogue Trader explore the Koronus Expanse in search of an unknown world that she keeps seeing in her visions. Idira claims that her senses will tell her when the goal is near.
languages.original_text: Идира просит Вольного Торговца исследовать Простор Коронус, чтобы найти неизвестный мир из ее видений. Когда Идира почувствует, что цель близко, она сообщит об этом.

traits.locale_text: Idira has earnestly requested that the Rogue Trader explore the Koronus Expanse in search for an unknown world that she keeps seeing in her visions. Idira claims that her senses will tell her when the goal is near.

Idira has earnestly requested that the Rogue Trader explore the Koronus Expanse in search of an unknown world that she keeps seeing in her visions. Idira claims that her senses will tell her when the goal is near.

languages.text: Idira a demandé {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} d'explorer les Étendues de Koronus pour trouver le monde inconnu qui ne cesse d'apparaître dans ses visions. Selon elle, ses sens l'avertiront quand l'objectif sera à proximité.
languages.original_text: Idira has earnestly requested that the Rogue Trader explore the Koronus Expanse in search of an unknown world that she keeps seeing in her visions. Idira claims that her senses will tell her when the goal is near.

traits.locale_text: Idira a demandé {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} d'explorer les Étendues de Koronus pour trouver le monde inconnu qui ne cesse d'apparaître dans ses visions. Selon elle, ses sens l'avertiront quand l'objectif sera à proximité.

languages.text: 伊迪拉恳切地请求行商浪人探索科罗努斯扩区，寻找某个她在幻象中多次看到的未知世界。伊迪拉声称，说当接近那片区域时，她会感觉到这一点。
languages.original_text: Idira has earnestly requested that the Rogue Trader explore the Koronus Expanse in search of an unknown world that she keeps seeing in her visions. Idira claims that her senses will tell her when the goal is near.

traits.locale_text: 伊迪拉恳切地请求行商浪人探索科罗努斯扩区，寻找某个她在幻象中多次看到的未知世界。伊迪拉声称，说当接近那片区域时，她会感觉到这一点。

languages.text: イディラは彼女がビジョンで見続けている未知の惑星調査のため、コロヌス・エクスパンスを探索するよう自由開拓者に熱心に頼み込む。イディラは目的地に近づけば、自分の感覚がそれを告げてくれると主張している。
languages.original_text: Idira has earnestly requested that the Rogue Trader explore the Koronus Expanse in search of an unknown world that she keeps seeing in her visions. Idira claims that her senses will tell her when the goal is near.

traits.locale_text: イディラは彼女がビジョンで見続けている未知の惑星調査のため、コロヌス・エクスパンスを探索するよう自由開拓者に熱心に頼み込む。イディラは目的地に近づけば、自分の感覚がそれを告げてくれると主張している。

languages.text: Idira hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} inständig gebeten, in der Koronus-Ausdehnung eine unbekannte Welt zu suchen, die sie immer wieder in ihren Visionen sieht. Idira ist überzeugt, dass ihre Sinne es ihr sagen werden, wenn das Ziel in der Nähe ist.
languages.original_text: Idira has earnestly requested that the Rogue Trader explore the Koronus Expanse in search of an unknown world that she keeps seeing in her visions. Idira claims that her senses will tell her when the goal is near.

traits.locale_text: Idira hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} inständig gebeten, in der Koronus-Ausdehnung eine unbekannte Welt zu suchen, die sie immer wieder in ihren Visionen sieht. Idira ist überzeugt, dass ihre Sinne es ihr sagen werden, wenn das Ziel in der Nähe ist.

languages.text: Idira ha pedido que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente explore la Extensión de Koronus en busca de un mundo desconocido que aparece repetidamente en sus visiones. Idira afirma que sus sentidos le dirán cuándo está cerca de su objetivo.
languages.original_text: Idira has earnestly requested that the Rogue Trader explore the Koronus Expanse in search of an unknown world that she keeps seeing in her visions. Idira claims that her senses will tell her when the goal is near.

traits.locale_text: Idira ha pedido que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente explore la Extensión de Koronus en busca de un mundo desconocido que aparece repetidamente en sus visiones. Idira afirma que sus sentidos le dirán cuándo está cerca de su objetivo.

languages.text: İdira, Hür Tacir'den görülerinde gördüğü bilinmeyen dünyayı Koronus Enginliği'nde aramasını ciddiyetle talep etti. İdira, hedefe yaklaştığını hissedeceğini iddia ediyor.
languages.original_text: Idira has earnestly requested that the Rogue Trader explore the Koronus Expanse in search of an unknown world that she keeps seeing in her visions. Idira claims that her senses will tell her when the goal is near.
